Procedure: 3rd/4th gear, 1500–6800 rpm, step 250 rpm, hold 3s each
Primary KPIs: Peak HP/TQ, BSFC, AFR, Knock Index
Scaling Factors: Correct to SAE J1349; DA, tire temp

Primary KPIs: Turbo lag, torque rise rate, lambda overshoot

Procedure: Drag prep surface, TC off, launch control 2500–3500 rpm sweep
Banked oval or runway, Vmax with GPS
Primary KPIs: Stability, coolant/oil temps, aero drag estimate (CdA)

Procedure: 30 min at 80% load; 10 min hot soak; restart

Primary KPIs: Map sync, dropout rate, timestamp drift
